scripts.dev: processmd contents/news/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/news > contents/summary_news.json && processmd contents/results/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/results > contents/summary_results.json && nuxt
scripts.generate: processmd contents/news/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/news > contents/summary_news.json && processmd contents/results/**/*.md --stdout --outputDir contents/_output_file/results > contents/summary_results.json && nuxt generate
